headline: Vistra: The AI Energy Winner That's Not Out Of Steam
summary: Vistra Corp. offers strong growth from AI-driven power demand, new assets, and buybacks with solid 2025 guidance. See why VST stock is a buy.

headline: How Vistra’s (VST) Data Center Power Play May Shape Its Growth Story
summary: Vistra recently completed the acquisition of seven modern natural gas generation facilities from Lotus Infrastructure Partners, adding approximately 2,600 MW of power capacity across key US markets including PJM, New England, New York, and California. This move positions Vistra to address rapidly rising power demand from AI-driven data centers and supports its role as a major provider of flexible and reliable electricity solutions. We'll examine how the new generation asset acquisitions...
